title: Bacteria
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Bert Van Bork
brief_description: Explains external and internal structures, manner of feeding, reproductive processes, classifications, and the ecological importance of bacteria. Also shows cell division and conjugation. Suitable for upper secondary level.
